info.title: Azure Arc VMware Management Service API

get.description: Lists all of the virtual machine instances within the specified parent resource.
Retrieves information about a virtual machine instance.

put.description: The operation to create or update a virtual machine instance. Please note some properties can be set only during virtual machine instance creation.

parameters.name: resourceUri
parameters.description: The fully qualified Azure Resource manager identifier of the resource.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

patch.description: The operation to update a virtual machine instance.

parameters.name: resourceUri
parameters.description: The fully qualified Azure Resource manager identifier of the resource.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

delete.description: The operation to delete a virtual machine instance.

parameters.name: deleteFromHost
parameters.description: Whether to delete the VM from the vCenter.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

extendedLocation.description: Gets or sets the extended location.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

ClusterProperties.description: Describes the properties of a Cluster.

uuid.description: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this resource.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this cluster resides.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the cluster.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the cluster.

moName.description: Gets or sets the vCenter Managed Object name for the cluster.

customResourceName.description: Gets the name of the corresponding resource in Kubernetes.

usedMemoryGB.description: Gets the used physical memory on the cluster in GB.

totalMemoryGB.description: Gets the total amount of physical memory on the cluster in GB.

usedCpuMHz.description: Gets the used CPU usage across all cores on the cluster in MHz.

totalCpuMHz.description: Gets the max CPU usage across all cores on the cluster in MHz.

value.description: The Cluster items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

GuestAgentProperties.description: Describes the properties of a Virtual Machine Guest Agent.

uuid.description: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this resource.

credentials.description: Username / Password Credentials to provision guest agent.

privateLinkScopeResourceId.description: The resource id of the private link scope this machine is assigned to, if any.

httpProxyConfig.description: HTTP Proxy configuration for the VM.

provisioningAction.description: Gets or sets the guest agent provisioning action.

status.description: Gets or sets the guest agent status.

customResourceName.description: Gets the name of the corresponding resource in Kubernetes.

GuestCredential.description: Username / Password Credentials to connect to guest.

username.description: Gets or sets username to connect with the guest.

password.description: Gets or sets the password to connect with the guest.

privateKey.description: Private key used to authenticate to a virtual machine through ssh.

HardwareProfile.description: Specifies the hardware settings for the virtual machine.

memorySizeMB.description: Gets or sets memory size in MBs for the vm.

numCPUs.description: Gets or sets the number of vCPUs for the vm.

numCoresPerSocket.description: Gets or sets the number of cores per socket for the vm. Defaults to 1 if unspecified.

cpuHotAddEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether virtual processors can be added while this virtual machine is running.

cpuHotRemoveEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether virtual processors can be removed while this virtual machine is running.

memoryHotAddEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether memory can be added while this virtual machine is running.

memorySizeGB.description: Gets the total amount of physical memory on the host in GB.

powerState.description: Gets or sets the power state of the host.

resourcePoolId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the resourcePool resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.

clusterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the cluster resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.

hostId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the host resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.

ResourcePatch.description: Object containing updates for patch operations.

extendedLocation.description: Gets or sets the extended location.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

ResourcePoolProperties.description: Describes the properties of a Resource Pool.

uuid.description: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this resource.

vCenterId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the vCenter resource in which this resource pool resides.

moRefId.description: Gets or sets the vCenter MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the resource pool.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the resource pool.

moName.description: Gets or sets the vCenter Managed Object name for the resource pool.

cpuSharesLevel.description:
Gets or sets CPUSharesLevel which specifies the CPU allocation level for this pool.
This property is used in relative allocation between resource consumers.

cpuReservationMHz.description:
Gets or sets CPUReservationMHz which specifies the CPU size in MHz that is guaranteed
to be available.

cpuLimitMHz.description:
Gets or sets CPULimitMHz which specifies a CPU usage limit in MHz.
Utilization will not exceed this limit even if there are available resources.

memSharesLevel.description:
Gets or sets CPUSharesLevel which specifies the memory allocation level for this pool.
This property is used in relative allocation between resource consumers.

memReservationMB.description:
Gets or sets MemReservationMB which specifies the guaranteed available memory in
megabytes.

memLimitMB.description:
Gets or sets MemLimitMB specifies a memory usage limit in megabytes.
Utilization will not exceed the specified limit even if there are available resources.

memOverallUsageGB.description: Gets the used physical memory on the pool in GB.

memCapacityGB.description: Gets the total amount of physical memory on the pool in GB.

cpuOverallUsageMHz.description: Gets the used CPU usage across all cores on the pool in MHz.

cpuCapacityMHz.description: Gets the max CPU usage across all cores on the pool in MHz.

customResourceName.description: Gets the name of the corresponding resource in Kubernetes.

value.description: The ResourcePool items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

reason.description: The reason for the condition's status.

message.description: A human readable message indicating details about the status.

severity.description: Severity with which to treat failures of this type of condition.

lastUpdatedAt.description: The last update time for this condition.

SCSIControllerType.description: Defines the different types of SCSI controllers.

SecurityProfile.description: Specifies the Security profile settings for the virtual machine.

uefiSettings.description: Specifies the security settings like secure boot used while creating the virtual machine.

skipShutdown.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to request non-graceful VM shutdown. True value for this flag indicates non-graceful shutdown whereas false indicates otherwise. Defaults to false.

StorageProfile.description: Specifies the storage settings for the virtual machine disks.

disks.description: Gets or sets the list of virtual disks associated with the virtual machine.

scsiControllers.description: Gets or sets the list of virtual SCSI controllers associated with the virtual machine.

VirtualSCSIController.description: This data object type contains the properties of a SCSI controller device attached to a virtual machine that is reported by the controller.

type.description: Gets or sets the controller type.

controllerKey.description: Gets or sets the key of the controller.

busNumber.description: Gets or sets the bus number of the controller.

scsiCtlrUnitNumber.description: Gets or sets the SCSI controller unit number.

sharing.description: Gets or sets the sharing mode.

VirtualSCSISharing.description: Defines the sharing mode for sharing the SCSI bus.

value.description: The VmInstanceHybridIdentityMetadata items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

VmInstanceHybridIdentityMetadataProperti.description: Describes the properties of Hybrid Identity Metadata for a Virtual Machine.

resourceUid.description: The unique identifier for the resource.

publicKey.description: Gets or sets the Public Key.

WindowsConfiguration.description: Specifies the Windows Configuration settings for the virtual machine.

fullName.description: Sets full name of the owner of the vm.

orgName.description: Sets org name to which the owner of the vm belongs.

domainName.description: Sets domain name that vm should join.

workGroupName.description: Sets work group name that vm should join.

productId.description: Sets product id of the vm.

autoLogon.description: Sets a value indicating whether auto logon is enabled.

timeZone.description: Specifies the time zone of the virtual machine. e.g. "Pacific Standard Time". Time zone name correspond to time zones listed at Microsoft Time Zone name values(https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/windows/embedded/ms912391(v=winembedded.11)).

operation.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for Azure Resource Manager/control-plane operations.

display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

operationsList.description: A list of REST API operations supported by an Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: The operation items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

Azure.ResourceManager.ResourceUriParamet.name: resourceUri
Azure.ResourceManager.ResourceUriParamet.description: The fully qualified Azure Resource manager identifier of the resource.
